addon.name: Confluence (Fire TV Kiosk)
addon.provider-name: Jezz_X, Team XBMC, modified by elmerohueso

extension.summary: Confluence skin by Jezz_X. (XBMC's default skin), modified by elmerohueso.
extension.description: The default Confluence skin with some modifications, meant to go with elmerohueso's Launcher build of XBMC for the Amazon Fire TV (see http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2790392).
